# Script

This script will download a dataset from https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip  and output tidy statistics summarized per subject and per activity.

# How to use ?
Just run the script in the 'UCI HAR Dataset' directory. It will output a stat.txt file containing the output statistics.
